title: Watch Heat's Amar'e Stoudemire do his best Michael Jackson impression
text:
Watch Heat's Amar'e Stoudemire do his best Michael Jackson impression FOX Sports 
Oct 1, 2015 at 6:52p ET + 
This might be the one time it's acceptable for an NBA player to call himself bad. Eric Gay / AP   6:52p ET 
Even though most NBA teams had their media day on Monday, some of the goofy goodness that took place when the cameras were on is just now leaking out. After all, teams use the day to film many of their in-game promos for the upcoming season, so there's a wide variety of video to choose from. 
Say you're in a musical mood, for example. In that case, you can check out Miami Heat big man Amar'e Stoudemire offering up his rendition of Michael Jackson 's "Bad": true â€” Amar'e Stoudemire (@Amareisreal) October 1, 2015 
Props to Stoudemire for offering up some vocals of his own and not just lip syncing. But that leg kick isn't exactly going to make people confuse Stoudemire with the late pop star. MORE NEWS: Want stories delivered to you? Sign up for our NBA newsletters.
